name: GalagaHero
description:
Programming: Ben Cracknell, Joshua Manton
Art: Cory Harrison

Keyboard
Move: Arrow keys
Shoot: Space

Controller
Move: Left stick/Dpad
Shoot: A

It's a rhythm game so you can only shoot when a note bar reaches your character.

After the game starts you'll have to hit "1" on the number row for song 1, and "2" for song 2. Song 1 isn't done, but song 2 is.

NOTE: You will have to relaunch the game in between songs if you want to play more than one. Gotta love that game jam jank :D
ALSO NOTE: Losing/damage is disabled because everybody that played it did terrible, but try your best because that's what's fun.
